actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow an additional advance refunding for certain tax-exempt bonds.
short_title: Local Schools and Infrastructure Improvement Act of 2012

summary.text: Local Schools and Infrastructure Improvement Act of 2012 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a second advance refunding of an original tax-exempt private activity bond.

titles.title: Local Schools and Infrastructure Improvement Act of 2012
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow an additional advance refunding for certain tax-exempt bonds.
